name: Star Trek: Armada 2
description:
Star Trek: Armada 2 is a strategy game developed by Mad Doc Software. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Star Trek: Armada 2 has a Metascore of 65, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Star Trek: Armada 2 is available on PC.
Ken Davis produced the game. Ian Lane Davis directed the game. It was scored by Danny Pelfrey.
